title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 August 2012 - XWiki

10:12 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <+mflorea> cjd, sdumitriu, sburjan`, tmortagne: 4.2M2 release was planned for today. I'd like to start the release this afternoon (EET). Let me know if you have any pending commits or blocking issues that need fixed.  
10:35 <+tmortagne> mflorea: nothing I can think of on my side  
10:36 <+mflorea> thanks. I'll send a separate mail (vote) for adding 4.2M3  
10:36 <+tmortagne> mflorea: failing EM test is probably my fault but did not had time to check what was wrong  
10:36 <+mflorea> I'll check them  
10:36 <+tmortagne> ok thanks  
10:36 <+mflorea> one is flicker for sure, need to fix it  
10:40 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:42 <+mflorea> sburjan: 4.2M2 release is planned for today. I'd like to start the release this afternoon (EET). Let me know if you have any pending commits or blocking issues that need fixed.  
10:43 <+sburjan> mflorea: well I reported 3 issues on 4.1M1, and afaik the ones about farm install and far muninstall are fixed. the only one remaining (which tmortagne put as blocker) is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XEM-220  
10:43 <+sburjan> besides that, nothing on my side  
10:43 <+sburjan> \*4.2M1  
10:43 <+mflorea> ok, thanks  
10:44 <polx> has quit  
10:59 <+sburjan> mflorea: I'm thinking we should remove the Tested Browsers and Tested databases for Milestones and maybe even for RC's. because I don't follow the MTR on Milestones, so it's kinda of useless generating it if it will be "not tested"  
11:01 <+mflorea> ok, but you need to send a mail/vote. We could maybe specify the Firefox version used for automated functional tests, because we have a couple and it means XE is tested with that version  
11:02 <+sburjan> ok. I will send a vote about this today  
11:33 <+mflorea> thanks  
13:02 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
13:02 <+sburjan> vote sent

16:00 <@cjd> ok to release for me  
16:01 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: I still have a few issues to document and close, but no commits  
16:02 <+mflorea> cjd: ok, thanks  
16:02 <+mflorea> sdumitriu: ok, I need to fix a test and then I can start the maven release
